title: Searge: 需要改变Twitter的措辞
author: pca006132
txt_content:
Searge: I've just realized that most of my followers stopped paying attention to details. I'll have to phrase my tweets differently from now on.
我现在才发现我大部分Twitter粉丝都不注意细节。我从现在开始需要改变推文的措辞

https://twitter.com/SeargeDP/status/651365898444521472

replies.author: pca006132
replies.txt_content:
1048139283 发表于 2015-10-6 20:56
是否采用更加猥琐的语气？
逸闻——Mojang，4J Studios及其员工的较重要的消息。

这应该算是其员工比较重要的消息吧:D (其实我也不太肯定23333)
